solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int[] productExceptSelf(int[] nums) {--newline--        int[] result = new int[nums.length];--newline--        for (int i = 0, tmp = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {--newline--            result[i] = tmp;--newline--            tmp *= nums[i];--newline--        }--newline--        for (int i = nums.length - 1, tmp = 1; i >= 0; i--) {--newline--            result[i] *= tmp;--newline--            tmp *= nums[i];--newline--        }--newline--        return result;--newline--    }--newline--}
